name: Seasonal Blue
description:
• There will be 3 levels in total.
  •  W(Jump),A(Left),D(Right) controls.
  • Collect all the Keys to move on to the next level/complete the game.
  • Lives doesn't reset when proceed to next level, but there will be healing item to be pick up to heal yourself.
  • Able to defeat the enemy by jumping on them.
